contact-us.title: Voulez-vous en savoir plus ?
contact-us.text: N'hésitez pas à nous contacter. Nous pouvons vous montrer notre système et voir ensemble s'il répond à vos besoins.

home.title: Software solutions for music administration
home.description: Offering tools to ease music administration for publishers, subpublishers, labels and independants

softwares.inpro: Management software designed for labels & producers

services.cloud-hosting: We have powerful servers to host and backup your data and let you access them securely.
services.support: We are ready to assist you every time you need us. We use any desk to access and control computers anywhere.
services.training: We are certified training company. In person or on the phone we can explain all the aspects of the software so you and your team can be a 100% autonomous.
